node.name: stark-ai
node.description: Stark is a cutting-edge chatbot designed to assist travelers in finding the most economical flight options. Built using Hume AI, Stark supports both voice and text interactions, providing audio outputs for a more engaging user experience. Its ability to recognize human emotions and handle interruptions seamlessly.
